title: The Residents - Not Available
description:
The Residents - Not Available (1974-1978)
44,1 khz Stereo 192kbps
Mpeg Layer 3 (MP3)
Total 48,6 MB

1. Part 1 - Edweena (9:29)
2. Part 2 - The Making of a Soul (9:59)
3. Part 3 - Ship's A'Going Down (6:33)
4. Part 4 - Never Known Questions (7:00)
5. Epilogue (2:21)


(sv)
S&auml;gs vara inspelad 1974, sl&auml;ppt innan Eskimo.
I enlighet med N. Senadas "Obskyritetsteori"
skulle skivan inte sl&auml;ppas f&ouml;rr&auml;n skaparna
praktiskt taget gl&ouml;mt bort att den existerade.

Officiellt skall Cryptic Corporation ha sl&auml;ppt
skivan mot Residents vilja f&ouml;r att ha n&aring;gonting att
ge ut n&auml;r Residents f&ouml;rsvunnit iv&auml;g till england
med mastringsbanden till Eskimo-skivan.


Oavsett hur mycket av detta som bara &auml;r skr&ouml;nor
s&aring; &auml;r det iaf en skiva som &auml;r lika konstig som
den &auml;r vacker.

Det finns 5 karakt&auml;rer:
Den sk&ouml;na Edweena, Piggsvinet, Kattf&aring;geln,
den Mystiske Fienden och den avl&auml;gsne kommentatorn
Farbor Remus.

Om jag fattat det r&auml;tt s&aring; &auml;r Piggsvinet och Kattf&aring;geln
k&auml;r i Edweena och den Mystiske Fienden (senare den Noble Fienden)
hj&auml;lper Kattf&aring;geln mot hans rival. I slutet visar det sig att
Farbror Remus och Edweena har rymt sin v&auml;g och gift sig.
Sen f&ouml;rl&aring;ter de 3 Farbror Remus.

Det &auml;r v&auml;ldigt f&ouml;rvirrande.
Luta dig bara tillbaka och njut av musiken.
Den liknar inte n&aring;gonting annat.


(eng)
Allegledly recorded in 1974 but released before Eskimo.
In accordance to N. Senadas "Theory of obscurity",
the album wasn't supposed to be released until its
makers hade virtually forgotten about its existence.

The official story goes that the Cryptic Corporation
released the album against the Residents' will,
because the group had fled to england, taking the Eskimo
master tapes with them, preventing the release of Eskimo.


No matter how much of all this is just more Residential hoax,
the album itself is a strange and wonderful one.

There are 5 characters:
The lovely Edweena, the Porcupine, the Catbird, the Enigmatic foe
and the distant commentator Uncle Remus.

If I've got everything right, the Porcupine and Catbird have both
fallen in love with Edweena. The Enigmatic Foe (later, the Noble Foe)
helps Catbird against his rival. In the end, it turns out Uncle Remus
have eloped with Edweena. The three then forgive Uncle Remus.

It's all very confusing.
Just sit back and enjoy the music.
It sounds like nothing else.
